positions.title: Senior Vice President Field Operations
positions.description:
Responsible for Revenue, Customer Success, and Services. LearnUp was acquired by ManpowerGroup (MAN) in February 2017.

LearnUp is a career management platform for entry-level workers. This includes the first and only pre-hire skills coaching program that helps employers hire thousands of qualified, ready-to-succeed workers. Beyond the initial hiring process, we help employees advance their careers through ongoing virtual coaching. LearnUp predicts and preempts turnover, improves hiring efficiency, and drives long-term business impact for large employers.

educations.title: UC Davis, Graduate School of Management

given.text:
When they talk about the Top 1% of employees, Dave fits in that bucket. I reported directly to Dave while at LearnUp and learned as much from him in my 18 months as I had in any role before that. Dave inspired me to be better as a rep and as an employee (overall in a startup). Under Dave I was able to onboard quickly, achieve a lot of success in a structure, and was given the tools, support and motivation to thrive. On top of that Dave led by example - he has impeccable Sales DNA and thrives in complex high value deals. At LearnUp we followed a process (MEDDIC), but had fun doing it. Dave was the driver of that culture and motivated our team to win.
…
See more

Dave is an enthusiastic and inspiring sales leader. His relentless focus on the customer's business problem shapes and defines our sales and marketing strategy. From working with clients to building teams, Dave leads by example, moving at breakneck speed. I worked with Dave closely for two years and would strongly recommend him to lead and strengthen any sales organization.
…
See more

Strong and strategic sales leader. Dave built a high performance team and sales process from the ground up. He successfully formed partnerships with numerous Fortune 500 companies. He's passionate about doing the right thing for the company and customers. I highly recommend working with him and would love to work with him again.

received.text: I’ve had the opportunity to work with The Success League on two separate engagements.  In both cases they quickly diagnosed the challenges & opportunities.  Kristen was uniquely efficient at helping us deploy practical tools and techniques to improve the performance of our customer facing teams.  Kristen’s unique coaching approach helped us get the results we needed, fast.

I had the opportunity to work with Neil McAdorey in his role as a subject matter expert and as a Global Account Executive for Workscape. I found Neil to be a consumate professional who took great pride in preparing for opportunities and executing on game plans that made for a mutual win for his client and for his team. I would highly recommend Neil for any Sales or Account Management position on both the direct and indirect side.
